item.name: Settings
item.appendix: At least "Enable Vim Emulation" must be enabled.
Then, choose mode change keyes as you like.
Note: Simultaneous jk/qw/sd must be used with
ChangeKey 3 or 6 are useful if you want to use
ESC/Ctrl-[ as is in modes other than Insert Mode.
Currently, all {count} operator is disabled (such 3w to move 3 words).
This feature makes too many remaps (9 times for most of moving),
and even the mouse moving is affected if you enable these feature.
If you would try this feature,
please remove comment out line in vim_emu/vim_emu_repeat.xml.
